H0.text: Condensation is the process by which energy from the Sun changes a liquid to a gas.

H1.text: Evaporation is the process by which energy from the Sun changes a liquid to a gas.

H2.text: Freezing is the process by which energy from the Sun changes a liquid to a gas.

H3.text: Melting is the process by which energy from the Sun changes a liquid to a gas.

A4.text: The sun (solar energy) drives evaporation of water from oceans, lakes, moisture in the soil, and other sources of water.

A5.text: Evaporation is an endothermic process, since heat is absorbed during evaporation.
